meaningMnemonic: Append and attach this document to your email. That’s called attachment. 添付 refers to the act of attaching something supplementary to another document, like attaching a file to an email or attaching a map to an invitation.
readingMnemonic: The reading for 添 is what you'd expect. The reading for 付 is the on'yomi reading ふ, which you've learned with 付近. But for this word it becomes ぷ from the rendaku fairies. Just think of an <vocabulary>attachment</vocabulary> where instead of a document or something, you get an attachment of <reading>poo</reading>p (ぷ). What a gross attachment. Your friend who likes to send poop attachments is dumb.
